0010101001111010 0110100100010101 0 -> sum: 1001001110001111, cout: 0

0111000011001110 1000010001100001 0 -> sum: 1111010100101111, cout: 0
1100110010000001 0011110110111101 1 -> sum: 0000101000111111, cout: 1
1001011101111110 1110011110101011 1 -> sum: 0111111100101010, cout: 1
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0

0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0

0111111111111111 1000000000000001 1 -> sum: 0000000000000001, cout: 1
